    #include <iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    #include <vector>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include <string>
    #define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
    #define ll long long
    #define M 1000000007

    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {  ll n,k;
        cin>>n;
        while(n--)
        {
           scanf("%lld",&k);
          k=sqrt(k);
          printf("%lld\n",k);

        }

    }
